message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This is a generous offer.
Alice, let's be real. I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you 400,000. Don't push your luck.
Bob, time is running out. This is my final offer.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Take it or leave it.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous.  Don't let this opportunity slip away.
Alice, I'm being more than fair considering the time pressure and inflation working against me. This is my final offer.  Let's close this deal and both walk away with something.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or we both lose out. This is my absolute final offer.
